2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Animal Messenger
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: By means of this spell, you use an animal to deliver a message.

2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Barkskin
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: You touch a willing creature. Until the spell ends, the target's skin has a rough, bark-like appearance.

2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Darkvision
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: You touch a willing creature to grant it the ability to see in the dark.

2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Enhance Ability
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: You touch a creature and bestow upon it a magical enhancement.

2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Find Traps
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: You sense the presence of any trap within range that is within line of sight.

2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Flame Blade
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: You evoke a fiery blade in your free hand.

2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Flaming Sphere
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: A 5-foot-diameter sphere of fire appears in an unoccupied space of your choice within range and lasts for the duration.

2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Gust of Wind
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: A line of strong wind 60 feet long and 10 feet wide blasts from you in a direction you choose for the spell's duration.

2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Heat Metal
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: Choose a manufactured metal object, such as a metal weapon or a suit of heavy or medium metal armor.

2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Hold Person
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: The target must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or be paralyzed for the duration.

2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Lesser Restoration
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: You touch a creature and can end either one disease or one condition afflicting it.

2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Locate Animals or Plants
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: Describe or name a specific kind of beast or plant. Concentrating on the voice of nature in your surroundings, you learn the direction and distance to the closest creature or plant of that kind.

2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Locate Object
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: Describe or name an object that is familiar to you. You sense the direction to the object's location, as long as that object is within 1,000 feet of you.

2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Moonbeam
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: A silvery beam of pale light shines down in a 5-foot-radius, 40-foot-high cylinder centered on a point within range.

2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Pass without Trace
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: A veil of shadows and silence radiates from you, masking you and your companions from detection.

2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Protection from Poison
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: You touch a creature. If it is poisoned, you neutralize the poison.

2ndLevelDruidSpells.Name: Spike Growth
2ndLevelDruidSpells.Description: The ground in a 20-foot radius centered on a point within range twists and sprouts hard spikes and thorns.
